Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, 'ANCHOR_RIGHT') GameTooltip:SetText(self.Diff:IsShown() and '团长有进度' or '与你的副本ID相同') GameTooltip:Show()

FontString.text: 微信扫码 查询团长

Scripts.OnEnter: if self.tooltip then GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(self.tooltip) end
if self.tooltip then GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(self.tooltip, 1, 1, 1, nil, true) end
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText('发送到聊天频道', 1, 1, 1, nil, true)

Scripts.OnMouseDown:
self.tex.up[1]:Hide() self.tex.up[2]:Hide() self.tex.up[3]:Hide()
self.tex.down[1]:Show() self.tex.down[2]:Show() self.tex.down[3]:Show()
Scripts.OnMouseUp:
self.tex.up[1]:Show() self.tex.up[2]:Show() self.tex.up[3]:Show()
self.tex.down[1]:Hide() self.tex.down[2]:Hide() self.tex.down[3]:Hide()

Scripts.OnLoad: local parent = self:GetParent() parent.Overview = self.Overview parent.Children = self.Children

Scripts.OnValueChanged:
local min, max = self:GetMinMaxValues() if userInput then self:GetParent():SetScrollOffset(max - floor(value + 0.5)) end
self:GetParent().scrollUp:SetEnabled(value ~= min) self:GetParent().scrollDown:SetEnabled(value ~= max)

Scripts.OnLoad:
self:SetOnScrollChangedCallback(function(self, offset) if not self.scrollBar.userInput then self.scrollBar:SetValue(self:GetNumMessages() - offset) end end)
local function OnClick(button) self:ScrollByAmount(button.direction * 3); end
self.scrollUp:RegisterForClicks('LeftButtonUp') self.scrollDown:RegisterForClicks('LeftButtonUp')
self.scrollUp:SetScript('OnClick', OnClick) self.scrollDown:SetScript('OnClick', OnClick)

Scripts.OnClick: local parent = self:GetParent() parent.scrollFrame:Fire('OnItemDel', parent, parent.item)
